TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeleteRuleOperation extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.RuleOperation
Public NotInheritable Class DeleteRuleOperation Inherits RuleOperation

Docs.summary: Represents an operation to delete an Inbox rule.

remarks.para: You can delete an existing class object by using this class.
This class derives from the class.

example.para: The following example searches the class to find an existing object with the name "MoveInterestingToJunk" from the user's mailbox. If the exists, the is deleted when the service.UpdateInboxRules(new RuleOperation[] { setRuleOperation }, true) line is executed.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DeleteRuleOperation class.

remarks.para: This method deletes a class object in a specific mailbox.

Docs.param: The identifier of the rule to be deleted and sent to the messaging server.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DeleteRuleOperation class with the specified rule identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RuleId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the rule to be deleted.

remarks.para: The property is the unique identifier for the class object that is to be deleted.
